events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but I want to request a refund because the size doesn't fit me at all.
The system has classified this case under the Refund cluster due to the customer's request for money back.
Assigning this refund request case to agent Jessica to assist the customer with their issue.
Hello! Thank you for contacting customer support. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so we can process your request efficiently?
Sure, my order number is 54321XJK. The jacket is too small despite ordering my usual size. I would like a refund.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process immediately and send you a return label by email.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the return label and prompt assistance with my refund.
The return label has been sent via email. Once we receive the returned jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received the return label and that the refund process is going smoothly.
Yes, I received the label and shipped the jacket back yesterday. Looking forward to receiving my refund soon.
Your refund has been processed successfully and should appear on your statement within 3-5 business days. Thank you!
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email. We appreciate your feedback to improve our service.
I completed the survey and am happy with how this refund request was handled. Thank you for excellent support.
Closing this case as the refund was processed successfully and the customer expressed satisfaction.
